So time is of the essence, people. I need loyalty.

translation.en: -What do you mean? -He lives here. He's the farmhand.
And animal wangler.
-No, it's actually wrangler. -Why have you even got that, Dad?
translation.it: - No, allevatore. - Che ci fai con quello?

translation.en: Because I didn't know that Hagrid lived in the barn. Who are you?
translation.it: Abbiamo Hagrid nel fienile. Chi sei?

translation.en: Listen, I'm Beano. I live here. I've worked here my whole life. I've been telling your non-identicals about the farm.
translation.it: Beano. Lavoro qui da una vita. Ho raccontato ai gemelli della fattoria.

translation.en: Dad, come and meet donkey number one. He's the cutest donkey in the world!
translation.it: Vieni a conoscere Numero uno, il più carino del mondo!

translation.en: Okay. Sorry. I just didn't…
I'm sorry about… this. I don't think it works anyway.
translation.it: Scusa per questo. Non credo che funzioni.

translation.en: [Buster] Dad, you scared Beano!
-That was an accident. -[grunts] And you scared the animals.
translation.it: - È stato un incidente. - Hai spaventato gli animali.

translation.en: Look at Mary! She's done a massive scared pony poo on the floor! Say sorry to her.
translation.it: Mary ha fatto una cacca enorme per la paura! Scusati.

translation.en: -Sorry, Mary. -In French.
-In? -French.
[groans] Pardon, Mary. Il très, uh, nincompoop.
translation.it: Pardon, Mary. È proprio un citrullo.

translation.en: So, you work here?
-Oui. -Do you know anything about plumbing?
-Wow, he's magic. -Now, this is just a temporary fix, okay?
translation.it: È magico. È una soluzione temporanea. Dovrò dare un'occhiata ai tubi.

translation.en: I have to take a proper look at your pipes.
translation.it: È una soluzione temporanea. Dovrò dare un'occhiata ai tubi.

translation.en: Okay, well, at least I can set up my workstation.
-Workstation? -[Matt] Yeah. That's why I'm here, to work on a big pitch.
translation.it: - Postazione? - Sì. Devo lavorare a un pitch.

translation.en: -No distractions. -What about your farm work?
translation.it: - Postazione? - Sì. Devo lavorare a un pitch. - E la fattoria? - Ci lavori tu.

translation.en: -Isn't that what you do? -I am not the farmer. I am the farmhand.
translation.it: - E la fattoria? - Ci lavori tu. Sono il bracciante, non il fattore. Tuo padre amava questo posto.

translation.en: The previous owner, your father, loved this place.
translation.it: Sono il bracciante, non il fattore. Tuo padre amava questo posto.

translation.en: -He was proper hands-on. -Was he?
[Beano] He was a local hero. He saved this place from the clutches of the bad people.
translation.it: Ha salvato la fattoria dalle grinfie di brutta gente.

translation.en: They were gonna knock it down.
These bad people, did they offer any money or anything?
translation.it: Questa brutta gente gli ha offerto dei soldi?

translation.en: What? Proper cash-a-rooney.
Yeah, but he loved the animals and farm way too much to ever sell it.
translation.it: ma amava troppo la fattoria per venderla.

translation.en: -He sounds awesome. -He was awesome.
You have to admit this place is past its sell-by date.
Nothing works. Even the hens don't work. Have you smelt the eggs? They stink!
translation.it: Non funzionano manco le galline. Le uova puzzano!

translation.en: Yes, 'cause no one's been here. We've been waiting for you,
translation.it: Perché non c'era nessuno. Aspettavamo te.

translation.en: and now you are here, you can help us save the farm.
translation.it: Ora che sei qui, puoi aiutarci a salvare la fattoria.

translation.en: [Matt] Get off me!
Can we save the farm, Daddy?
Yeah, Dad, can we save the farm with Beano?
No, staying here was just a temporary thing, and I'm gonna get on with some work.
translation.it: No, stare qui è una cosa temporanea e io devo lavorare.

translation.en: We need to persuade your dad that this farm is way more important than his silly little pitch. Who's with me?
translation.it: Convinciamolo che la fattoria è più importante del pitch. Ci state?

translation.en: -Yes! -Yeah!
Okay. Walk this way.
Dad, you know Mummy would've wanted you to help us save the farm.
translation.it: Mamma avrebbe voluto che salvassi la fattoria.

translation.en: You saw how twinkly she was last night.
translation.it: Hai visto come brillava ieri sera.

translation.en: Okay, I tell you what, I will give you an hour tomorrow morning, and you can show me how this whole farm works.
translation.it: Ok, domattina vi do un'ora e mi mostrate come funziona questa fattoria.

translation.en: Yes!
Well done, Mr. C.
[Beano] Hello! Cock-a-doodle-doo! This is your 5 a.m. wake-up call.
translation.it: Ehilà! Chicchirichì! Sono la sveglia delle cinque.

translation.en: Come on, sleepyhead.
-5 a.m.? It's the middle of the night. -Excuse me! Cows don't wait.
translation.it: - È ancora notte! - Le mucche non aspettano.

translation.en: They've got to be milked, ready or not, and you've got to pick up their poop.
translation.it: Bisogna mungerle e devi raccogliere la cacca.

translation.en: Come on.
Why have I got to do this job? It's awful.
Cows' poop are like golden nuggets. Fertilizes the grass, helps it grow.
translation.it: La cacca di mucca è oro. Concima l'erba, la fa crescere.

translation.en: We love the poop. We worship the poop.
translation.it: Noi amiamo la cacca. Adoriamo la cacca.

translation.en: How much wood could a woodchuck chuck if a woodchuck could chuck wood?
translation.it: Sopra la panca la capra campa, sotto la panca crepa.

translation.en: Hey, you remind me of someone. Have you seen the film The Shining?
translation.it: Mi ricordi qualcuno. Hai visto Shining?

translation.en: Here's Beano!
Let's chop some wood.
You need to put your back into it, Farmer Cunningham. Swing it really high.
Yeah? Try…
-Pretend I'm a big voluptuous pig. -Yeah.
translation.it: - Fai finta che sia un maiale. - Sì.

translation.en: [Beano] Litter. Floor. Pig. Litter.
Ooh! Lollipop!
Dangerous. Put your litter in the bin.
translation.it: Pericoloso. Metti i rifiuti nel bidone,

translation.en: But most importantly, never ever leave that gate to the far field open,
translation.it: ma soprattutto non lasciare mai aperto il recinto che dà sui campi.

translation.en: 'cause if that gate is left open, the animals will escape.
If they escape, they will get hurt, and if they get hurt, you will get hurt.
translation.it: Poi, si fanno male. Se si fanno male loro, ti fai male tu.

translation.en: -Do you wanna meet the cows? -Yeah! -Yes, you do! Come on. Let's go. -[Matt] Oh.
translation.it: Vi presento le mucche? Certo che sì! Andiamo.

translation.en: We've got Matilda, Patty, Harry, Hermione, Miss Trunchbull.
translation.it: Matilda, Patty, Harry, Hermione, la sig.na Trinciabue.

translation.en: A cow called Miss Trunchbull? Oh, yes. Nanny McPhee and Susan Boyle.
translation.it: - Si chiama Trinciabue? - Sì. Tata Matilda, Susan Boyle.

translation.en: -[cow moos] -How many sheep do you have?
Every time I count them, I fall to sleep, so I never get to the end.
translation.it: Se le conto, mi addormento. Non arrivo alla fine.

translation.en: -What do you get paid for doing all this? -All this?
translation.it: - Quanto ti pagano per tutto? - Tutto?

translation.en: I get to live in the barn for free and eat all the produce that we grow, and I mean everything, and you give me money for sweets.
translation.it: Vivo gratis nel fienile, mangio i prodotti e tu mi dai i soldi per le caramelle.

translation.en: Obviously, you have to pay for other things, like the vet.
-The vet? -[Beano] The vet.
-Someone that looks after animals. -I know.
translation.it: - Il veterinario? - Cura gli animali. So cos'è. Ma sono soldi sprecati.

translation.en: Why do you pay for a vet? It's a waste of money.
translation.it: So cos'è. Ma sono soldi sprecati.

translation.en: They're like dentists. Always add a bit extra. A rip-off.
translation.it: Sono come i dentisti, una fregatura.

translation.en: -Do you know him? Can you trust him? -I'm a "her" actually.
translation.it: - Ti fidi di lui? - Sono una lei.

translation.en: And I don't rip anyone off.
-You're the horse lady. -And you're the road hog.
-I won't be staying long, don't worry. -[vet] That's a shame.
translation.it: - Non mi fermo molto. - Che peccato.

translation.en: I baked these, but seeing as you're not staying…
translation.it: Ho fatto questi, ma dato che non resta…

translation.en: Give 'em to me! Sorry, I just love Miss Ashley's cookies.
translation.it: Li dia a me! Adoro i biscotti di Miss Ashley.

translation.en: -Chocolate chip? -Triple chocolate chip.
Triple chocolate chip! Arnie! Look what Daddy's got for you.
translation.it: Triplo cioccolato! Arnie? Guarda che ti do.

translation.en: I take it you're acquainted with all the animals here, then? [Matt] I mean, I'm not really an animal person.
translation.it: - Immagino che conosca tutti gli animali. - Non mi piacciono tanto.

translation.en: Well, that's a shame. Mistletoe Farm has some wonderful livestock.
translation.it: Che peccato. Qui c'è un bestiame meraviglioso.

translation.en: -And you're about to get a new addition. -Huh?
translation.it: Ci sarà un nuovo arrivato. Holly sta per partorire.

translation.en: -Holly's about to pop. -What?
translation.it: Ci sarà un nuovo arrivato. Holly sta per partorire. - Cosa? - È incinta.

translation.en: She's pregnant.
You're kidding! [laughs]
You're kidding.
No, 'cause a kid is a baby goat. It doesn't matter.
You should prepare yourself because goats often have twins, sometimes triplets.
translation.it: Si prepari, le capre a volte fanno tre gemelli insieme.

translation.en: -Triplets? -[piglet squeals]
Oh, hello, Mr. Weenie! How are you today?
Hello, Ashley. Thank you for the cookies. I love you.
translation.it: Ciao. Grazie dei biscotti. Ti voglio bene.

translation.en: -Oh, it's okay! -Wee, wee, wee.
-It's a present! -Okay. That's… weird.
translation.it: - È un regalo! - Ok. Siete strani.

translation.en: Listen, it was nice to meet you for a second time.
Hopefully I don't have to see you again. Oh, no. I just mean the animals are fine.
translation.it: Spero di non rivederla. Cioè, che gli animali stiano bene.

translation.en: I come and check up on them every week.
And if Holly Goat's waters break, give me a call at the surgery.
translation.it: Se le si rompono le acque, mi chiami in clinica.

translation.en: I think we've got it covered.
Yeah.
Ooh. I think there's something brewing, Weenie.
-Dad, who was that? -That was the vet.
She's really pretty.
She's really expensive is what she is, Rosie, and apparently we're having kids, maybe three.
translation.it: È molto cara, Rosie. A quanto pare, avremo dei cuccioli.

translation.en: But you've just met.
No, not me and Miss Ashley. The Holly jolly goat.
translation.it: Non io e Miss Ashley. La capra Holly.

translation.en: Mr. Cunningham, I've give Weenie too many cookies. There's poop everywhere. Take her. I need to clean it.
translation.it: Cunningham, gli ho dato troppi biscotti. C'è cacca ovunque. Prendi. Devo pulire.

translation.en: But I can't… Uh…
-Beano! Beano! -[kids laugh]
Oh, I'm glad you're back.
We've got a cat, two budgies, a parakeet, a ferret, a rabbit, and Oscar the pig.
translation.it: Un gatto, due pappagalli, un parrocchetto, un furetto, un coniglio e un maiale.

translation.en: Seems to have eaten something that he shouldn't have again.
translation.it: Ha mangiato qualcosa che non doveva.

translation.en: -So, how did it go over at Mistletoe? -I met the new owner, Mr. Cunningham.
translation.it: Com'è andata alla Mistletoe? Ho conosciuto il proprietario.

translation.en: -Ooh, what's he like? -To be honest, he's a bit…
translation.it: Ho conosciuto il proprietario. - Che tipo è? - È un po'…

translation.en: -Couldn't put it better myself. -[woman laughs]
What's Oscar been up to this time?
He's eaten my dad's underpants again.
translation.it: Ha mangiato di nuovo le mutande di papà.

translation.en: -[Beano] Mr. Cunningham! -Oh God!
-You nearly gave me a heart attack! -Sorry.
translation.it: - Cunningham! - Mi viene un infarto! Scusa. Abbiamo fatto una lista di cose da fare.

translation.en: Me and the kids have come up with a roster of farm chores,
translation.it: Scusa. Abbiamo fatto una lista di cose da fare.

translation.en: and we put you in charge of Christmas!
translation.it: Ti tocca il Natale! Devi sistemare il fienile per l'Hoedown!

translation.en: Yep. You've got to fix the barn up for the Hoedown Snowdown!
translation.it: Ti tocca il Natale! Devi sistemare il fienile per l'Hoedown! - Cosa? - Si fa tutti i Natali.

translation.en: -The what? -Happens every Christmas at the barn.
translation.it: - Cosa? - Si fa tutti i Natali.

translation.en: We snow the place down. There's mulled wine and barn dancing, cowboy.
translation.it: Copriamo il fienile di neve. C'è vino cotto e si balla.

translation.en: Wait, no. It will not be happening this year. I need to do a pitch on Christmas Eve, and I need quiet.
translation.it: Quest'anno non si farà. Devo lavorare e ho bisogno di silenzio.

translation.en: No, this will not do. You have got to find a way to get Christmas into this barn.
translation.it: No, così non va bene. Trova un modo per portare il Natale qui dentro.

translation.en: Your father would be very disappointed.
Listen, you can have your Snowdown Hoedown if you like, but you're not gonna have it on my farm.
translation.it: Senti, fa' pure il tuo Snowdown Hoedown, ma non lo farai nella mia fattoria.

translation.en: Oh, boy, does your dad get angry.
I don't think he likes Christmas anymore. He even made me leave the Christmas tree at home.
translation.it: Non gli piace il Natale. Abbiamo lasciato l'albero a casa.

translation.en: We need help, guys, and I know exactly who we need.
translation.it: Abbiamo bisogno di aiuto. So chi può aiutarci.

translation.en: We need to get your dad into the village to meet the village people.
-Yes! -Ooh.
This, guys, is Cobbledon.
Post Office. Letters to Santa go there, okay, guys?
translation.it: Le poste, per le letterine a Babbo Natale, ok?

translation.en: And now I'm gonna take ya to the Cobbledon Arms.
translation.it: E ora vi porto al Cobbledon Arms.

translation.en: Come on, we're clearly not welcome here.
-What's all this? -It's for you!
Beano told us you've come to save Mistletoe Farm.
translation.it: Beano dice che salverai la fattoria.

translation.en: You're our hero!
Come in, come in, let's meet everyone.
This is Perky, the landlord.
Pleasure to meet you, son of Cunningham. Hey, first one's on me.
translation.it: Piacere. La prima la offro io.

translation.en: This is Ted the butcher, Barry the baker, and Merrick.
Let me guess, the candlestick maker?
-How'd you know? -I was joking.
He does! He makes candles.
I'm Otto, the builder. Anything you need fixing, I'm your man.
translation.it: Otto, costruttore. Se devi aggiustare qualcosa, chiama.

translation.en: And I'm Barney, the postman.
translation.it: E io sono Barney, il postino.

translation.en: I delivered the inheritance. Told you you'd like it.
-And I'm the town crier! -Hello.
If you pop your head round here, you'll see Happy, Sneezy, Dopey, and this bundle of joy, Grumpy.
translation.it: Lì ci sono Gongolo, Eolo, Cucciolo e il gioioso Brontolo.

translation.en: It's what they played in panto last year. They were typecast.
My name's Gerald Favor. I'm the director of the Cobbledon Players.
Did I ever tell you all about that time I did The Mousetrap?
translation.it: Vi ho raccontato di Trappola per topi?

translation.en: [all] Yes!
And one of my favorites, Miss Bow. Only because I own the sweet shop.
translation.it: - Una mia preferita, Miss Bow. - Ho il negozio di caramelle.

translation.en: Who are these little mites?
We have Master Buster, Miss Violet, Miss Rosie, and the twins.
translation.it: Abbiamo Buster, Violet, Rosie e i gemelli.

translation.en: They don't look like twins. -[both] They're non-identical. -Ah.
-They're mine. -Where's your mummy?
She died.
-Oh… -Uh, here, have some sweets.
And I knitted you some novelties. Perhaps you'd like to choose one each.
translation.it: Vi ho fatto dei giocattoli a maglia. Uno a testa.

translation.en: -Thank you. -Thank you.
Hi, I'm Miss Nerris.
Cobbledon Village School. Are these the children joining my class?
translation.it: Scuola di Cobbledon. Saranno in classe mia?

translation.en: I'm excited about getting them to hang out with children their age.
translation.it: Sì. Così, stanno coi bimbi della loro età.

translation.en: There's only two children in my class. There's only two children in the whole school, actually.
translation.it: Ci sono solo due bimbi in classe e in tutta la scuola.

translation.en: You see, we're a very small village with a teeny tiny population. Forty-seven. Twenty-nine letterboxes.
translation.it: - È un paesino di pochissime persone. - 47. 29 buche delle lettere.

translation.en: Fine, as long as they do educational activities. Of course. -If I can think of any. -[laughter]
translation.it: - Basta che facciano attività didattiche. - Se me ne vengono in mente…

translation.en: What I mean is education comes in many forms.
Does it?
-Yeah. -That is true.
Do you like singing?
-Do you? -You're welcome to join the choir.
translation.it: - Ah, sì? - Potete unirvi al coro.

translation.en: Hi, I'm Abel. I organize the welly throwing.
I'm Aaron, head bell ringer. We practice on a Monday if you're free.
translation.it: Aaron, capo campanaro. Prove il lunedì.

translation.en: I'm Miss Verity. I run the village bookshop and library. Pop in any time for a book and a biscuit.
translation.it: Miss Verity. Gestisco la biblioteca. Venite a trovarmi.

translation.en: By the way, my name's Miss Womble, and I've created the knitting circle,
translation.it: Io sono Miss Womble e ho creato il circolo del lavoro a maglia.

translation.en: and I knit all the jumpers that you can see here,
translation.it: Ho fatto tutti i maglioni che vedete,

translation.en: every single one of them, and the hats,
and we'd be delighted if you'd like to all join in,
translation.it: Saremmo lieti se vi uniste a noi.

translation.en: and we'd especially like you to join, Mr. Cunningham.
If you don't know how to knit, we could knit you a jumper.
translation.it: Possiamo fare per lei un maglione

translation.en: We could knit your face onto it if you like.
translation.it: con sopra la sua faccia, se le va.

translation.en: What do you think?
-He's handsome, isn't he? -Yes.
Listen, I'm not really into all this community stuff.
We were gonna ask you to be the president of the Christmas Association.
Your father always cut down the biggest Christmas tree and donated it to the village square.
translation.it: Tuo padre tagliava un albero e lo donava alla piazza.

translation.en: We don't have a Christmas tree at the house.
translation.it: - Non abbiamo l'albero a casa. - Manco le lucine.

translation.en: -Not even any Christmas lights. -No Christmas on Mistletoe Farm?
translation.it: - Non abbiamo l'albero a casa. - Manco le lucine. Niente Natale a Mistletoe Farm?

translation.en: Well, we'll have to see what we can do about that, won't we?
translation.it: Dobbiamo vedere cosa si può fare, giusto?

translation.en: Absolutely.
Uh, who fancies a Cobbledon Soda? Yeah. You take a seat. Come on.
translation.it: Assolutamente. Vi va una bibita? Va' a sederti. Forza.

translation.en: -[Matt exhales] -How's Holly Goat?
Um, I haven't checked on her. I don't know.
translation.it: Non ho visto come sta. Non lo so.

translation.en: You haven't checked on your pregnant goat?
translation.it: Non ha visto come sta una capra incinta?

translation.en: Well… No, I'm sure she'll be fine.
translation.it: Non ha visto come sta una capra incinta? Se la caverà.

translation.en: -I'll check when I get back. -[whimsical music plays]
5,000, and he hasn't paid… Have you paid for anything?
translation.it: Non ha pagato 5000… Qualcosa l'hai pagata?

translation.en: Sweets. Sweets? £68 on sweets.
It can't be.
Is it saying "Matt"?
-Hey, Holly. How you doing? -[Holly bleats]
Are you a bit anxious? My wife was scared when she had our first baby.
translation.it: Sei in ansia? Mia moglie aveva paura al primo parto.

translation.en: I mean, not as scared as me. I was terrified about being a dad.
translation.it: Non quanto me. Diventare papà mi terrorizzava.

translation.en: Didn't know if I'd be any good. Nice to see you talking to the animals, Mr. Cunningham.
translation.it: - Non mi sentivo capace. - Bello che parli con gli animali.

translation.en: You know, they understand everything we say,
and we can understand every bleat, moo, bark, oink, if we truly listen.
translation.it: Anche noi capiamo belati e grugniti se ascoltiamo.

translation.en: Well, I have listened, understood, and now I'm leaving.
translation.it: Ho ascoltato, ho capito e ora me ne vado.

translation.en: Mr. C, when you were talking to Holly about not being a good enough dad…
translation.it: Quando hai detto a Holly che non sei un papà capace…

translation.en: -I think you're going to be a great dad. -"Going to be"?
Me and your popsicle, we were close.
He let me call him grandpops because he knew he missed out on his own kid and grandkids.
translation.it: Si faceva chiamare "nonno" perché si era perso figlio e nipoti.

translation.en: I don't want you missing out too.
I am nothing like my "popsicle," okay? I don't think you should be sticking your nose into my family.
translation.it: Io non sono come il mio "papino". Non ficcare il naso nella mia famiglia.

translation.en: We're family too! How?
If your popsicle was my grandpops, then you are more or less my dad.
translation.it: Se il tuo papino era mio nonno, tu sei mio padre.

translation.en: What are you talking about? You're a fully grown man, and you are definitely not my family.
translation.it: Ma che dici? Sei un uomo adulto e di sicuro non sei la mia famiglia.

translation.en: -Did you put that step there? -No.
translation.it: - Hai messo tu il gradino? - No.

translation.en: -Night, Dad. -[sad music plays]
You literally took the words right out of my mouth.
translation.it: Mi hai tolto le parole di bocca.

translation.en: Hey, Buster, what's up?
-I had a bad dream. -Oh, buddy, come here.
translation.it: - Ho fatto un brutto sogno. - Vieni qui.

translation.en: You know bad dreams aren't real.
Do we have to go to school tomorrow? School is meant to be fun.
translation.it: - Dobbiamo andare a scuola? - Dovrebbe essere divertente.

translation.en: But the children might laugh at me.
translation.it: Gli altri potrebbero prendermi in giro.

translation.en: -Why would anybody laugh at you? -Because I wear sparkly things.
You know, Buster, there's absolutely nothing wrong with wearing sparkly things. Anyone can wear sparkles.
translation.it: Non c'è niente di male a portare i brillantini. Possono portarli tutti.

translation.en: Even Fleece?
Definitely Fleece. Even Mary and Bright?
Yes, ponies love sparkles. Even you?
Well, I'm not exactly a sparkly kind of person,
translation.it: Io non sono esattamente il tipo,

translation.en: but your mum, she used to love anything with glitter and sequins.
translation.it: ma a tua madre piacevano le cose con lustrini e paillette.

translation.en: Did she wear a princess crown?
I bet she did when she was your age.
-Shall we go to bed? -Yeah.
Come on, then.
Mary and Bright fed and exercised? -Check! -Check.
translation.it: - Mary e Bright hanno mangiato? - Fatto!

translation.en: -Cows and goats milked? -[both] Check.
Pigs and piglets cleaned? -Double check. -Double check-a-rooney.
translation.it: - Maiali e maialini puliti? - Doppio fatto.

translation.en: Next job, school.
We don't wanna go to school.
-We wanna stay on the farm with you. -I don't think your dad would like that.
translation.it: - Vogliamo stare con te. - Papà non vuole.

translation.en: -How are we gonna get to school anyway? -Yeah, Dad always gives us a lift.
translation.it: - Come ci andiamo? - Ci accompagna papà.

translation.en: -[Buster] What are they? -Bicycles.
-[Buster] I don't know how to ride. -You don't know how to ride a bike?
translation.it: - Non so andarci. - Non sai andare in bici?

translation.en: Well, then, you're gonna have to learn. First bikes, then tractors.
translation.it: Allora, dovrai imparare. Prima le bici, poi i trattori.

translation.en: Get your right leg, put it over the bike.
translation.it: Metti la gamba destra sulla bici.

translation.en: Look forward, okay? No wobbling. These are your brakes.
translation.it: Guardate avanti. Non ondeggiate. Questi sono i freni.

translation.en: Okay, guys? Very straight. Focus. Let's go.
Second one, go.
Let's go, go, go! Yes, buddy.
translation.it: Andiamo. Vai! Sì, amico. Piedi sui pedali. Sì!

translation.en: Feet on the pedals. Yes! You've got it!
translation.it: Vai! Sì, amico. Piedi sui pedali. Sì! Ce l'hai fatta!

translation.en: Yes!
-Have you seen the kids? -They've gone to school.
-What? How? -On their bikes. Like I did.
You went to school? Yeah. I went to farm school.
-Is that even a thing? -Uh, yes.
Are you sure they're gonna be okay just biking off? -They don't know the area. -They'll be fine.
translation.it: - Non sarà pericoloso mandarli in bici? - Se la caveranno.

translation.en: -Where's the school? -In the village.
-Where's the village? -I don't know.
-[Buster] We're lost. -[Violet] It's okay, Buster.
translation.it: - Ci siamo persi. - No! Tranquillo, Buster.

translation.en: [Charlie] I'm getting the wobbles again!
Dad says to always stay where we are until someone finds us.
translation.it: Non ci muoviamo finché non ci trovano.

translation.en: There's no one here though. Yes, there is. Look!
[all] Yoo-hoo! Hello!
Hello, young 'uns.
We're late for school. The school's only up the road. Come on.
translation.it: - Facciamo tardi a scuola. - È in fondo alla strada.

translation.en: Is there really no Christmas on Mistletoe Farm?
Nope, no Christmas.
We're gonna have to help your father bring back Christmas traditions.
translation.it: Aiuteremo papà a recuperare le tradizioni.

translation.en: [Perky] And this is your new school.
translation.it: Ed ecco la vostra nuova scuola.

translation.en: There you are, children! Don't worry, I've only just got here.
Kayla and Kayan are dying to meet you.
translation.it: Kayla e Kayan non vedono l'ora.

translation.en: Pop your bikes on the floor. Thank you so much.
translation.it: Mettete le bici per terra. Grazie.

translation.en: -In you go. -Break a leg!
Right, come on then. In you go. Sit down at the table.
Right, then.
So now we have a big, huge class, we can do so many things.
translation.it: Adesso abbiamo una classe enorme, possiamo fare tante cose.

translation.en: We can… make a school choir or put on a big Christmas play.
translation.it: Possiamo fare un coro o una bella recita di Natale.

translation.en: -Yes! -Yes!
What else do you wanna do?
-We don't really like school. -Especially our old school.
translation.it: Non ci piace la scuola. Soprattutto quella vecchia.

translation.en: Why not?
I had a lot of friends, but when Mum died, I got sad, and they called me boring.
translation.it: Ero triste per la mamma e le mie amiche mi dicevano "noiosa".

translation.en: -Oh gosh, that's terrible, isn't it? -[Kayla and Kayan] Yeah.
translation.it: Cavolo, è terribile, vero? - Sì. - Sì.

translation.en: -What about you, Violet? -I get scared.
Not about anything special. I just get the wobbles sometimes.
translation.it: Non di una cosa in particolare. Mi viene l'ansia.

translation.en: That's all right. We all get the wobbles sometimes.
Kids used to laugh at me because I wear sparkles. We love sparkles here, don't we?
translation.it: - Mi sfottevano per i brillantini. - A noi piacciono.

translation.en: -Yeah, they're pretty. -And they're cool.
How about we decorate the school Christmas tree?
translation.it: Vi va di decorare l'albero della scuola?

translation.en: -Yes! -[Miss Nerris] Make it sparkly.
Come on, then. Follow me.
That's it. Pop your decorations on.
-Where'd you get that star, Violet? -I made it for my mum at nursery.
translation.it: - Dove hai preso la stella? - Era per mamma.

translation.en: We put it on the tree every year, but there's not a tree at the farmhouse.
translation.it: Si mette sull'albero, ma non ce l'abbiamo.

translation.en: Well, Miss Nerris, maybe we can lend them our tree this year. We don't mind.
translation.it: Possiamo prestargli il nostro. Per noi va bene.

translation.en: I don't think your dad would like it.
I think our dad would be so busy working, he wouldn't even notice.
translation.it: Sarà così preso che non ci farà caso.

translation.en: Really? Well, that's perfect.
We'll take the tree to the farmhouse, and he won't even know we've been.
translation.it: Portiamolo alla fattoria, non si accorgerà di niente.

translation.en: Global? Global, global. Global.
-Marketing. Advantages. -[knocking on door]
Merry Crimble!
Festive gifts and Womble's knits! -It's Christmas! -Ho-ho-ho!
translation.it: - Regali di Natale e lavoretti di Womble! - È Natale!

translation.en: -Sorry, what? -Where would you like us to start?
translation.it: Che succede? - Da dove iniziamo? - Cioè?

translation.en: -[Matt] Start? -We've got to start on the decorations.
translation.it: - Da dove iniziamo? - Cioè? - Con le decorazioni. - Ok.

translation.en: -Okay. -No, we'll dress the set.
-Come on, Dame Judi. -See you later.
translation.it: Prepariamo la scenografia. Dai. A dopo.

translation.en: Oh, Merry Christmas, Mr. Cunningham!
Okay, listen, everyone. Sorry, can I get your attention?
I really do appreciate the community spirit. I do, okay? But is there not a time that is more convenient?
translation.it: Mi piace questo spirito di comunità, ma tornerest in un altro momento?

translation.en: Christmas won't wait for convenience. The Hoedown Snowdown will not stage itself.
translation.it: Il Natale non aspetta. Lo spettacolo non si fa da solo.

translation.en: We are not having the Hoedown Snowdown this year. Not here, not now.
translation.it: Quest'anno non lo facciamo. Non qui, non adesso.

translation.en: Okay? So if everyone can just…
Thank you so much. It's great, but if you can…
That's it, take your hammer. Off you go. Very good. Thank you.
All the best. Thank you.
They're only trying to bring Christmas spirit.
I don't need Christmas spirit. I need peace and quiet.
translation.it: Non mi serve. Mi serve il silenzio.

translation.en: No. No. Out! Fine, no. Tell you what. Stay. Make yourself a sandwich.
translation.it: No. Fuori! Ok. Fatti un tramezzino. Come se fossi a casa tua.

translation.en: Make yourself at home.
translation.it: Ok. Fatti un tramezzino. Come se fossi a casa tua.

translation.en: -Get out of my way. -[donkey brays]
Don't worry, donkey number two. He's just a silly old Grinch.
translation.it: Tranquillo, è solo un vecchio Grinch.

translation.en: [laughs] I know. -Who wears a tie at a farm? -[knocking]
translation.it: Infatti. Chi mette la cravatta in campagna?

translation.en: Ho-ho-ho. I've got a delivery for you.
-What delivery? -Christmas cards from the villagers.
A lovely one from Miss Womble. Hand-knitted, impressive. Two lines of poetry in it.
translation.it: Uno di Miss Womble lavorato a mano con versi di poesia.

translation.en: -Sorry, are you reading my post? -Only for health and safety.
translation.it: - Leggi la mia posta? - Solo per sicurezza.

translation.en: Shall I take yours to the sorting office now?
It's Womble, L-E. Not E-L.
translation.it: Si scrive Womble, L-E, non E-L.

translation.en: You might wanna put a kiss on each card. We usually do, just to be friendly.
translation.it: Mettici un bacino. Noi lo facciamo tra amici.

translation.en: I'm not putting a kiss.
And talking of Christmas cards, your father used to be so popular,
translation.it: A proposito, tuo padre era così benvoluto

translation.en: he had hundreds of cards up here round on the walls.
translation.it: che aveva centinaia di biglietti appesi.

translation.en: And generous!
He used to put a £10 note in each card with a little note saying, "Have a Cobbledon Brew on me."
translation.it: Metteva soldi in ogni biglietto con scritto: "Ti offro una birra".

translation.en: Did he? Good for him. Right. That's the last one. And you need to go.
translation.it: Buon per lui. L'ultimo. Te ne devi andare.

translation.en: I have a very important virtual meeting with a friend of mine starting very soon.
translation.it: Tra poco ho un incontro virtuale importante con un amico.

translation.en: [Barney] All right.
We have real friends round here, Mr. Cunningham, not virtual ones.
translation.it: Da queste parti, abbiamo amici veri, non virtuali.

translation.en: Virtual friends, I don't know!
Ah, Miss Nerris, seeing as I'm passing, I'll just give you one of those.
translation.it: Mi trovo a passare, perciò le do questo.

translation.en: -Lovely. Thank you. -From…
What's this?
We brought it from the school!
translation.it: - L'abbiamo portato da scuola! - Per tirarti su!

translation.en: -Miss Nerris said we could! -Can we show Kayla and Kayan the animals?
translation.it: - L'abbiamo portato da scuola! - Per tirarti su! - Possiamo vedere gli animali? - La scuola?

translation.en: -Haven't they got to get back to school? -No. Children love animals.
translation.it: - Possiamo vedere gli animali? - La scuola? Adorano gli animali. Gliel'ho detto, ci sono tante forme d'istruzione.

translation.en: Like I said, Mr. Cunningham, education takes many forms.
translation.it: Adorano gli animali. Gliel'ho detto, ci sono tante forme d'istruzione.

translation.en: [Beano] Mr. C! Mr. C!
Farmer Cunningham, it's Holly Goat. Her waters have broken!
translation.it: Signor C! Cunningham! Si sono rotte le acque!

translation.en: -What? -[Beano] Quick!
Okay, listen, I need you to call Miss Ashley, okay?
And… Oh, get a discount.
I'm coming!
Hang on!
Miss Ashley's on her way. Do you mind if me and the kids stay and watch?
translation.it: Miss Ashley sta arrivando. Possiamo assistere?

translation.en: -This would be very educational. -Please can we see the baby goat get born?
Stay up there, okay? Stay out the way because this is grown-up stuff.
translation.it: Mettetevi lassù. Questa è roba per adulti.

translation.en: Blow out, blow in, blow out, blow in.
You don't blow out, blow in. You breathe in, you breathe out.
Breathe in, breathe out. Breathe in, breathe out.
I can't breathe. I'm having a panic attack.
You're hyperventilating. You need to calm down.
No! Please! Come on, sheepy-sheep.
-That's it. I do have somewhere to go. -[bleating]
translation.it: Brave. Devo andare in un posto.

translation.en: -Yes! -That's… Oh, God! There's a head!
There's a head in a bubble. I can't… I'm gonna…
translation.it: Una testa in una bolla. Adesso…

translation.en: No, no. You are not gonna pass out! This is just Mother Nature taking its course.
translation.it: No. Non svenire! È solo la natura che fa il suo corso.

translation.en: Look, I'll just take a… Oh my God. Yeah, that is a bit weird. I'm dizzy!
translation.it: Guarda. Oddio. Sì, è strano. Mi gira la testa.

translation.en: Let me help.
Sh, it's all right. It's all right. You're doing really well. Keep pushing.
translation.it: Sta' tranquilla. Stai andando benissimo. Spingi.

translation.en: Harder! Keep pushing! Harder! You're doing great! Harder! Keep pushing.
translation.it: Più forte! Continua a spingere! Alla grande! Spingi forte!

translation.en: -Violet, you totally smashed it! -Look at what you did!
translation.it: Violet, hai spaccato! Guarda cos'hai fatto!

translation.en: Look what you did.
I got here as fast as I could. How's everything going?
translation.it: Ho fatto prima che potevo. Come va?

translation.en: -Well, you missed the whole thing. -I wouldn't be so sure.
translation.it: - Ti sei persa tutto. - Sei sicuro?

translation.en: -She's right. I can see another bubble. -Beano, listen. I don't feel…
translation.it: - È vero. C'è un'altra bolla. - Non mi sento…

translation.en: What are you doing? This is no time to sleep.
translation.it: Non è il momento di dormire.

translation.en: Violet will help you. She delivered the first one.
translation.it: Violet ha fatto partorire il primo.

translation.en: -Well done, Violet. -[Violet] Come on, Holly.
[Miss Ashley] Ah! I'll just, uh, wrap her up in a towel.
translation.it: - La avvolgo in un asciugamano. - Sì.

translation.en: So cute.
-Ooh. Oh! Looks like she's pushing again. -[phone rings]
No, now is not a good time. I can't talk.
Fletcher wants an update now! I tried covering for you, but she wants to speak to you.
translation.it: Fletcher vuole sapere! Ti ho coperto, ma vuole parlarti!

translation.en: -Tell her I'm indisposed. -I tried, but she's insisting!
Looks like a breech. I can find the feet. I need you to pull.
translation.it: È un parto podalico. Ecco i piedi. Tira.

translation.en: -What are you doing, anyway? -I'm trying to deliver a kid.
-What? -Oh God, Miss Fletcher's calling me.
Cunningham! Is that you?
Hi! Miss Fletcher.
It has come to my understanding that you're in some kind of creative retreat
translation.it: Mi pare di capire che è in una sorta di ritiro creativo

translation.en: so as to have no distractions, as it were. Is that right?
translation.it: per non avere distrazioni, è così?

translation.en: That's right!
-That's it! Push! I need you to pull. -[grunts]
-Is that a woman's voice I can hear? -No, it's just a kid.
translation.it: - È la voce di una donna? - Un bambino.

translation.en: Come on, Holly. Push.
Children and business do not mix!
translation.it: I bambini non vanno d'accordo con gli affari!

translation.en: Sorry, Miss Fletcher, you're breaking up. I have to go.
translation.it: Scusi, non la sento bene. Devo andare.

translation.en: Come on, Holly! Push! I need you to push. Pull.
translation.it: - Dai, Holly! Spingi! - Puoi farcela, Holly.

translation.en: -That's it. -[Matt grunts, sighs]
-We did it! -[Miss Ashley] We did it!
Sorry. I didn't… It's just…
-Yeah. -We made a baby! We made a baby!
translation.it: - Abbiamo fatto un bambino! - Un bambino!

translation.en: Ooh, big daddy!
[chuckles] Look how many babies you've gone and done. Who's a good daddy? You're a good daddy. Who's a good daddy?
translation.it: Guarda quanti ne hai fatti. Chi è un bravo papà? Tu sei un bravo papà.

translation.en: -[bleating] -[Miss Ashley] No, she's not taking.
I'm afraid you're going to have to hand-rear them. Take them in for a while.
translation.it: Dovrai allattarli a mano. Tenerli un po' in casa.

translation.en: Miss Holly's exhausted.
Don't worry, they'll be okay.
If you can bottle-feed them, take them to bed, cuddle them,
translation.it: Devi dargli il biberon, portarli a nanna, coccolarli,

translation.en: keep them warm, sing to them, things you did with your own children.
translation.it: Devi dargli il biberon, portarli a nanna, coccolarli, cantargli la canzoncina, come coi figli.

translation.en: I didn't really do the nursing stuff.
Well, now's your chance.
-[goat bleats] -Okay.
So you did really well, Miss Violet. Would you like to come and help me at the surgery?
translation.it: Sei stata bravissima, Violet. Vuoi venire ad aiutarmi in clinica?

translation.en: -[gasps] Yes, please. Can I, Dad? -I don't see why not.
translation.it: - Sì. Posso, papà? - Non vedo perché no.

translation.en: I know he wants them to be in school, but seeing little Violet there in action
translation.it: Vedere Violet in azione mi fa pensare

translation.en: makes me think farm school would be better for their confidence.
translation.it: che la rurale aumenterebbe la loro autostima.

translation.en: Oh, thank you, Miss Nerris. That's what I've been trying to tell people.
translation.it: Grazie, è quello che dico sempre.

translation.en: Farm school is amazing, and Farmer Cunningham needs it more than anyone.
translation.it: La scuola rurale è fantastica. Cunningham ne ha bisogno.

translation.en: And the kids, too, especially Kayla and Kayan. They've been on their own up until now.
translation.it: Anche i bambini, specie Kayla e Kayan. Sono stati da soli finora.

translation.en: Don't worry, Miss Nerris. Beano's got a plan.
translation.it: Non si preoccupi, Miss Nerris. Beano ha un piano.

translation.en: We've got three baby Christmas goats.
So what about… Snowy?
-Yeah. -Yeah? Star.
-Yeah! -Do you want to name the third?
-Yes. -[Beano] Go on, then!
We want to name it after our mummy.
This little dude's a boy.
We don't mind. We want to call it Sarah.
Welcome, Sarah,
to the family.
-Hello? -[Mo] Yo, she's after your address.
-She wants to know where the farm is! -What?
[Mo] Fletcher! She said she was disappointed with your FaceTime call, said you were distracted by your kids!
translation.it: Fletcher è delusa dalla videochiamata, eri distratto dai figli!

translation.en: Well, to be honest, it wasn't my kids. It was Holly's.
[Mo] You were supposed to go to that farm to work, to save our jobs. The Banda House vultures are circling this deal, bro!
translation.it: Dovevi andare lì a salvare i nostri posti. Banda House sta per chiudere l'affare!

translation.en: -[knocking on door] -Somebody at the door.
translation.it: Dovevi andare lì a salvare i nostri posti. Banda House sta per chiudere l'affare! Bussano alla porta.

translation.en: Hi, Mr. Cunningham. Just thought that it'd be really nice if the children could spend time with the baby goats?
translation.it: Salve, sarebbe bello se i bambini potessero stare un po' con le caprette.

translation.en: -[bleating] -Uh, what, today?
Me and the villagers thought it'd be really great if everyone could take part in their education,
translation.it: Abbiamo pensato che sarebbe bello partecipare tutti alla loro istruzione.

translation.en: and today is your turn.
I've already got five children, three kids. You want to give me two more?
translation.it: Ho già cinque figli e me ne dà altri due?

translation.en: "It'd be so good for them to have children their own age to play with."
translation.it: "Così giocano coi bimbi della loro età".

translation.en: -Isn't that what you said? -Yes. But I didn't mean--
translation.it: - Non hai detto così? - Sì, ma…

translation.en: Okay, off you pop. Have fun!
-Enjoy farm school! -Right, who wants to dig up some sprouts?
translation.it: Buona scuola! Chi vuole scavare i cavolini?

translation.en: Yes, come on. Follow me! Last one to the top of the hill has to peel them too!
translation.it: Seguitemi! Chi arriva ultimo dovrà pure pelarli!

translation.en: You too, Mr. Cunningham!
Come on, Rudolph!
Come on, boy.
-What's going on? -We're having sprouts for lunch.
[laughs] Good luck getting my kids to have sprou-- [Buster] Mm.
Buster, where's your lollipop?
I gave it to Billy Goat. I like sprouts now.
-Do you want a sprout? -No. Absolutely not.
You can't hide in your study forever!
So we need to find a way to draw him out of that boring little study.
translation.it: Troviamo un modo per farlo uscire dallo studio.

translation.en: -Any ideas? -Why don't you show Dad your tractor?
Oh yeah! Even Daddy likes tractors.
Yes. Yes, I love it.
It's big. It's bold. It's beautiful!
Come on, follow me.
Let's go!
-Ready? Let's go! Woo-hoo! -[exciting music plays]
Innovation that we can bring to your products and your businesses.
-We go the extra mile. -[bleep]
-Why is it doing that? The-- -[beeping]
What's that?
It's crashed. Oh my God. Yeah, I know. It's worse than that. Okay.
translation.it: Bloccato. Oddio. Lo so, è molto peggio.

translation.en: What else did I write? I wrote "connections."
Oh, this is a nightmare!
What's that growing on the tree, Beano?
Oh, this? This is mistletoe. It grows all over the farm.
translation.it: Il vischio. Cresce in tutta la fattoria. Perciò si chiama Mistletoe Farm.

translation.en: That's where Mistletoe Farm gets its name. But our mistletoe is magic.
translation.it: Il vischio. Cresce in tutta la fattoria. Perciò si chiama Mistletoe Farm. Però, il nostro vischio è magico.

translation.en: What do you mean?
Our mistletoe doesn't make people just kiss.
translation.it: Questo non fa solo baciare le persone.

translation.en: It makes them fall in love.
Come on! I'll show ya.
Donkey number one, donkey number two, I've seen the way you look at each other.
translation.it: Numero uno, numero due, ho visto come vi guardate.

translation.en: Now it's time to bring some magic to your romance.
translation.it: È ora di portare magia nel vostro amore.

translation.en: Yes!
[chuckles] Love is in the air!
That's what I'm saying. It's an absolute nightmare.
My computer's crashed. He's left me all these unpaid bills.
translation.it: Ho il PC bloccato, le bollette.

translation.en: -Hay bills, electricity, gas, water! -I knew this would happen. Your father's left you in trouble.
translation.it: - Fieno, corrente, gas, acqua! - Ecco. Ti ha lasciato nei guai.

translation.en: I know that you said to manage my expectations. We're coming back to London straight away.
translation.it: Mi avevi detto di non illudermi. Torniamo subito a Londra.

translation.en: Sorry, Mum, can I call you back?
-Do you want to ride the tractor? -No! I've got tons of work to do!
translation.it: - Vuoi guidare il trattore? - No! Devo lavorare!

translation.en: -I don't wanna go back to London. -We have to do something.
Magic mistletoe. Voilà.
Merry Christmas to you.
-Merry Christmas. -How's it going?
We're trying to help with the bills so he doesn't take them back to London.
translation.it: L'aiutiamo con le bollette, così non vanno a Londra.

translation.en: No way! You can't go back there! This is your home now.
translation.it: Non ci andrete! È questa casa vostra.

translation.en: -What's going on? -Their dad wants to take 'em to London.
translation.it: - Che succede? - Vuole portarli a Londra.

translation.en: But you're the future of Cobbledon. All right, let me get one.
translation.it: Siete il futuro di Cobbledon. Ne prendo uno.

translation.en: Hello, children. I've brought you each a ball of wool and some needles.
translation.it: Ciao, vi ho portato dei gomitoli e degli aghi.

translation.en: You can choose your color. Ooh! The mistletoe.
I haven't seen this for a while. I'm gonna have a whole basketful.
translation.it: Non lo vedevo da un po'. Ne prendo un paniere.

translation.en: -Oh! -[Miss Womble] Thank you.
-Never know when the magic will happen! -No!
translation.it: Non si sa mai quando scocca la magia!

translation.en: Hello, Otto.
Hey, you want some? It's for a good cause.
Why would I want some? It's not like I want to kiss Miss Nerris.
translation.it: Perché? Mica voglio baciare Miss Nerris?

translation.en: I've made a contribution.
I'll keep it safe… until you're ready.
translation.it: Lo terrò al sicuro finché non sarai pronta.

translation.en: I've been ready for years, Otto.
Beano, can I get some of that?
Thank you very much.
Hello, ladies! [chuckles]
Hello!
[gasps] How are the kids? Mr. Cunningham's doing really well with them.
translation.it: - I capretti? - Cunningham va alla grande.

translation.en: He's even named one of them Sarah.
I'll take one of those. You never know when you might need it.
translation.it: Ne prendo uno. Può sempre servire.

translation.en: -[Beano] Yeah. -[whimsical music plays]
Bye.
It's gonna happen! It's gonna happen!
Sorry to disturb you.
I hear you're thinking about going back to the city.
translation.it: So che vuoi tornare in città.

translation.en: -Where'd you hear that? -The village vine.
translation.it: - Come lo sai? - Voci di paese.

translation.en: -Can you take Snowy? -Sure.
-Come on. -I just need to go boil the kettle.
Get the hot water bottles ready. Come on.
Hey, guys.
I'm gonna keep you nice and warm.
-[bleating] -[Miss Ashley] Good girl.
How are you girls getting on?
-New owner treating you well? Huh? -[donkeys bray]
translation.it: Il nuovo padrone vi tratta bene?

translation.en: -[Matt] You're great with the animals. -Thank you. Just did Holly's milk.
translation.it: - Sei brava con gli animali. - Grazie. - Ho munto Holly. - Grazie.

translation.en: Thank you.
It's easier with Holly's kids than my own.
translation.it: Coi figli di Holly è facile.

translation.en: Must be hard for them losing their mum. I don't really like to talk about it.
translation.it: - È dura perdere la mamma. - Non voglio parlarne.

translation.en: Well, if you ever do want to talk about it, I'm good with humans too.
translation.it: Se ti viene voglia di parlarne, sono brava pure con gli umani.

translation.en: -[cell phone rings] -Oh, yeah.
Emergency. It's, uh, Oscar the pig again.
translation.it: Emergenza. È di nuovo Oscar il maiale.

translation.en: -Gotta go! -No, wait.
You dropped something.
Do you think she used the mistletoe?
Doesn't look like it. But if your dad and Miss Ashley did fall in love, he would definitely want to stay and save the farm.
translation.it: Non credo, ma se s'innamorassero, papà resterebbe a salvare la fattoria.

translation.en: -We need to make it happen. -[Charlie] What about Mum?
[Rosie] I think she wants that too.
translation.it: Secondo me, lo vuole anche lei.

translation.en: We need to find a way to get Miss Ashley back here. Why don't we ask her for dinner tomorrow?
translation.it: - Facciamo tornare Miss Ashley. - Invitiamola a cena.

Everybody, quiet! Quiet!
The bell.
This way. Well done, Rudolph. This way.
[kid] Jingle!
[villagers] Jingle! Jingle!
Who is Jingle? Absolutely no idea.
translation.it: - Chi è Jingle? - Non ne ho idea.

translation.en: [both] Jingle!
[Miss Womble] Oh, look, it's Jingle!
Jingle. Well done, Rudolph. You found him. Finally you're a real sheep dog!
translation.it: Bravo, Rudolph. Sei un vero cane pastore!

translation.en: Right, I'm going in. Mr. Cunningham, hold my legs!
translation.it: Vado dentro. Cunningham, tienimi le gambe!

translation.en: Okay, well, everybody, hold on.
[Beano] Ready. Steady, please.
After three. One… two… three!
translation.it: Al mio tre. Uno… due… tre!

translation.en: -[Matt] Get back. -Catch him, please!
-Yeah! -We've got him!
Well done, Rudolph.
-Who are you? -I'm Matt's mum.
translation.it: - Lei chi è? - La mamma di Matt.

translation.en: Nana!
[chuckles] Nana! Shall we?
-Right. -Right.
-Uh, sit. -Sit.
-[Louis] Ow! -[Marlon] What? [Louis] Just go on.
All right, Grumpy? What are you doing here?
Before I retired, I was a lawyer,
and I represented your father, Mr. Cunningham.
translation.it: e ho lavorato per tuo padre, Cunningham.

translation.en: I'd like to draw your attention to this special clause in the will.
translation.it: Vorrei farti notare questa clausola del testamento.

translation.en: -What's a special clause? -Is it a Santa Claus?
[chuckles] This special clause stipulates
that the farm cannot be sold under any circumstances
translation.it: che la fattoria non può essere venduta in nessun caso

translation.en: and is only inherited property
if you stay on the farm and sustain it for the years to come.
translation.it: rimanendo alla fattoria e mantenendola negli anni.

translation.en: I'm afraid the farm is not sold and never can be, as long as the family want to stay here.
translation.it: Temo che la fattoria non possa essere venduta finché la famiglia ci vuole stare.

translation.en: We do want to stay here!
I want to stay here forever!
Perhaps you'd like to look through it yourselves.
Let me see this.
Look at this!
-[Louis laughs] -This is just old-fashioned nonsense.
-[Louis and Marlon laugh] -[Marlon] It's… -It's, uh… -[Louis clears throat]
-Drake. -Yep.
-What? -Yep.
-Okay. -[Louis] Okay.
Well, I hope you know this has been some serious time-wasting.
translation.it: Spero sappiate che è stata un'enorme perdita di tempo.

translation.en: -And you! -[Louis] And you, you!
You! You, you, you, you.
You owe us for dry cleaning and the hospital bills.
translation.it: Rimborsaci la tintoria e le spese ospedaliere.

translation.en: Do you have any idea how much pain I was in?
-Would you like me to show you out? -We're going. Keep your stupid farm!
translation.it: Vi accompagno fuori? Tieniti la tua fattoria!

translation.en: [Louis] Yeah!
-[Miss Ashley] Out! -[Louis] Stinks!
-The farm is ours! -[cheering]
Oh, we've got the farm! The farm is ours!
translation.it: È nostra! La fattoria è nostra!

translation.en: How are we gonna keep it ours?
I think I know a way to keep the farm. Ask the kids about the magic.
translation.it: Conosco un modo. Chiedi ai bambini della magia.

translation.en: He means the mistletoe.
What is it with all this mistletoe business?
It's magic.
Okay. I don't think that mistletoe can be magic, Buster.
translation.it: Ok. Non credo che il vischio possa essere magico.

translation.en: Is that…
It's the town crier.
For a minute, I thought you were Father Christmas.
I know this is something you might not want to hear,
and it's fine if you can't deal with it right now,
translation.it: Non fa niente se non riesci ad affrontarlo ora,

translation.en: but I brought you some mistletoe
translation.it: ma ti ho portato del vischio…

translation.en: from the fields back there.
Another Christmas gift
to try and make up for all the Christmases I've missed.
translation.it: per farmi perdonare dei Natali che mi sono perso.

translation.en: Sorry? What? What?
I know it's a shock.
What? Are… are you saying, um…
Hello, son.
How? I… I mean, you left me the farm in your will.
translation.it: Ma mi hai lasciato la fattoria in eredità.

translation.en: I left you the farm, but I never said anything about being dead.
translation.it: Ti ho lasciato la fattoria, ma mica ho detto che ero morto?

translation.en: And as you can see, I'm alive and well.
translation.it: Come vedi, sono vivo e vegeto.

translation.en: Was everybody in on it?
I just wanted to bring my family back together again. I'm so sorry.
translation.it: Volevo solo riunire la famiglia. Ti chiedo scusa.

translation.en: Will you take it, son?
It's going to change your life.
Hi, Grandpops.
How nice to meet you properly at last.
Big day.
The biggest. [chuckles] It's crazy. I…
I dunno.
What you do know is that everybody loves you.
translation.it: Però, sai che tutti ti vogliono bene.

translation.en: Especially me.
I'm a very patient person. I mean… Well, I mean, just…
translation.it: Sono una persona molto paziente. Voglio dire. Cioè…

translation.en: [Beano] Yee-haw! Welcome to this year's Hoedown Snowdown.

translation.en: What are you doing here?
-We bring good news. -What?
-Emblem loved your pitch. -Mm-hm.
translation.it: A Emblem è piaciuto il pitch.

translation.en: How?
Beano came all the way to London and showed us the pitch. -Mo read it, very well I may add. -[Mo] Thank you.
translation.it: Beano è venuto a portarcelo a Londra. Mo l'ha letto benissimo.

translation.en: They loved it! They loved the whole community aspect of it.
translation.it: Gli è piaciuto! Per lo spirito di comunità e c'era un'altra parola…

translation.en: And there was another word…
translation.it: Per lo spirito di comunità e c'era un'altra parola…

translation.en: -Heart. -Heart. They loved it. Said it had heart.
translation.it: Cuore. Hanno detto che aveva cuore.

translation.en: So I want you to get yourself suited and booted
and get yourself back to London. Get out of this place.
translation.it: e tornare a Londra, vattene da qui.

translation.en: No. I don't really want that job anymore. But I am glad that you two get to keep yours.
translation.it: No, grazie, ma sono felice che non vi abbiano licenziati.

translation.en: Surely you're not gonna stay here, are you? [chuckles]
translation.it: Non avrai mica intenzione di restare qui?

translation.en: -Yee-haw! Say Cobbledon! -[all] Cobbledon!
-Christmas! -[all] Christmas!
-Cobbledon Christmas! -[all] Cobbledon Christmas!
translation.it: Natale a Cobbledon! Natale a Cobbledon!

translation.en: -Ooga-ooga-ooga! -Ooga-ooga-ooga.
-Beano! -[all] Beano!
-Say yes, Beano! -[all] Yes, Beano!
-Stage dive! -[all] Stage dive!
You gon' catch me? You gon' catch me, right?
Here I come!
♪ And let it snow… ♪
Miss Fletcher, it turns out that kids really do count,
and I want to spend some time with my kids, and my children
translation.it: Voglio passare del tempo coi miei figli,

translation.en: and my farmhand, and a very expensive vet,
translation.it: col bracciante e la veterinaria perché ho un annuncio da fare.

translation.en: because I am coming out.
translation.it: perché ho un annuncio da fare.

translation.en: I'm coming out as a farmer. That's right. I am now one of the village people.
translation.it: Voglio fare il contadino. Esatto. Sono un abitante del villaggio.

translation.en: -Oh, wow. -And nothing is gonna stop me!
translation.it: - Wow. - Non mi fermerete. SONO UN ABITANTE DEL VILLAGGIO
